data.text: The app is broken again and doesn't open. Just sits there with the circular arrow spinning. Seems like this happens about once a month and then an update comes out and it works for a few weeks and then it's back to not opening again. Menards app just always works and opens quickly. Lowes, you need to get this resolved once and for all.

I never write app reviews. Making an exception for this. App has been broken for a week or two now. Search works maybe 1 out of 10 times. Eventually it thinks it has no network connection and stops working completely. The latest update has not fixed the issue. Really disappointing that a huge company like Lowe's has let such a major bug fester in production for so long.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: This app is trash. Constantly loses connection or freezes. Links from email auto open in the app, but the app never loads the link you click on and just shows a spinning circle. Filters reset constantly when searching for items in the app. Previous purchases are hard to search and sometimes items are missing/incomplete. Better to stick to just using the web.

UPDATED: I updated to the new version this morning, I checked for a new version last night before I wrote the original review. Thanks so much for the quick response and fix! It's back to working! (original post) >The last update was awful. Can't do a search at all... Just glitches with the blue circle. I used the app a few days before the update and it was great. Now I have to go to the web version just to do a search.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which is now available in the Play Store. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Recent update has made this app useless. It says it can't find an internet connect. I've halted the app, cleared the cache, updated it and it's still stuck. When I try to do a search, it refuses to let me type and tries to force in search suggests of its own. It makes it COMPLETELY IMPOSSIBLE to use!! Fix this thing or I'll be doing all my shopping at Home Depot,

Update actually a degrade. After the recent upgrade the ability to search has been diminished to unable to even function. I hit search, try to enter the name of the item(s) and get an endless loop of the wait circle trying get started and aborting immediately. This presents as a stuttering screen and a dot where the circle will be blinking on and off. If you are persistent you might, after 5 minutes or so, get another letter or two entered...
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: This app gets worse with every single update. Departments used to be easy to navigate and now it's a mess. Pages and search results take so long to load I've actually walked around for a few minutes and actually found the thing I'm looking for in the store BEFORE the page loaded. You know what has no problem loading? That stupid rewards splash screen that takes up an extra 5 seconds of your time every time you open the app. It takes longer for the home page to load than that stupid promo wipe.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: The app rarely works well. Consistently logs me out and requires full two-factor for logins each time despite being set to "remember me" and "remember this device." Search rarely brings up the desired results but they are listed in the "other people purchased" suggestions so clearly they exist and are available. Web links on mobile try to open in the app but never load in and appear to completely break the app, a full restart is required after trying for anything to function.

Search continues to be broken, start to type and then just the circle searching. Tells me I have no internet connection when there is nothing wrong with the connection. Removed and reinstalled the app, still the same no change. Need to get this fixed before people go to your competitors. Need to make this easy for people to use your app.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which is now available in the Play Store. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: I like to use this app but it glitches a lot. It freezes and I have to force stop it or uninstall and reinstall it. It gets frustrating when trying to search for items or placing an order. I've also noticed that the prices on the app do not match store prices. If I'm placing an order for pick up I'm paying more for the items than if I were to go in the store and get them, it defeats the "free" pickup because you pay more for the products.

The app is unusable for searching since the last update. You start typing what you are looking for, and it starts searching and prevents you from typing anything else until the search returns. If you try clicking on one of your previous search terms, it says you are off line. Lowe's always does this with their updates. Change something that works fine, break it and in a few weeks release another update that half way fixes what they broke.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: The app can be glitchy at times. Usually it works great and I can see my store card account, make payments and purchase items. But other times it deletes items from my cart, causes issues when I attempt to check out, and other technical issues. If it were not for those times I would give it 5*.

Most recent updates do not work very often if at all. Very often won't find an internet connection, has a terrible time consistently recognizing several different keyboards, and the search capabilities are now terrible. Uninstalling and using the website for a few months until it gets fixed because this is now a total pain to use.

The search feature works like a charm. found EXACTLY what I was looking for at good, reasonable prices. Checking out was a challenge: Getting the billing information in was like climbing a small mountain, was never happy. Setting your pick-up/delivery preference is a bit cumbersome/not that obvious/user friendly. Sort of seems INITIALLY like you have to choose per item. Otherwise satisfied-pleased!

The app would be absolutely fantastic if it didn't hop you back and forth to the web page version and make you sign back in every time you click something. As high level of a corporation as Lowe's is, you would figure they could hire a decent app development firm! It's 2024, there is no excuse for a clunky, slow, buggy UI in an app, especially one that acts as a point of sale!

Almost as bad as the Home Depot app. Slow, clunky, difficult to navigate, the search function is essentially broken. I type in lawn mower and the first search option is a ceiling fan. This is what happens when you go with the lowest bid on everything or, worse yet, make an app in house, because, "it can't be that hard". I refuse to purchase anything via the app, because of the headache involved. It erased my card info, cleared my shipping info. It's bad.

My big problem with this app is the fact that the order tracking is horrible. If you have a single order and it's a split shipment (not by my request), it's difficult to get the updated information on the app, and it doesn't tell you what is being delivered in the updates on the app. The app doesn't show the dates for the order to be delivered either (at least for me), and I only get date updates in texts or via email (which aren't in a great and readable format). Used on a Galaxy S22+

Seems as though Lowes monitors ebay for pricing. I was going to purchase from ebay because the price was well over $100 difference. I checked my lowes online cart one last time (in order to delete the items) and I had a message that my item had a new price equal to that of the lowest on ebay. That is awesome! So, I gladly purchased from Lowes. Thanks, Lowes peeps!

If it worked, this would be a decent app. Unfortunately, I can't add widgets, scanning a barcode results in "oops something went wrong" error, and the app rarely works at all inside the store. So yeah, it's trash unworthy of your hard drive space.

Review update: I love this app & rely on it heavily for all my projects. The only problem I've found since some of the more recent updates is that under order tracking, the feature that listed the scanned custom paint codes next to each of my paint purchases is no longer there and that's a huge loss to me. However the developer's quick response & fix to my previous install issue has been great & has allowed me to keep on track my project timelines. Thank you Lowe's
data.replyText:
Hi Frisky,
We’re so sorry you’re experiencing this issue.
We fixed this issue with the latest version of the app, can you please update to our latest release # 21.1.4 published on 2/2/2021. Please contact us at apphelp@lowes.com if the issue still persists at your end.
Thank you for shopping Lowe's Home Improvement !

data.text: Update: still trash. Constant errors signing in. Always logs you out, never remembers login. No fingerprint login. For a company the size of Lowe's, it's really disappointing. Too often it directs to a browser, or pages dont load, it changes my store on it own, etc. Purchases often dont show. Many annoying things about it, but have to use it. At least they finally added Lowe's card integration. I'd be embarrassed if I was corporate or part of the web team.

Trash app designed to make like harder. I can't copy and paste info to add a receipt that they couldn't get on my account in store. If I swap between my email and the app I have to start over. I have to fight to get my rewards because your doing everything in your power to prevent me from getting them.

I can sign in on the website, but not the app. After entering my password or a one time passcode, the sign in button changes from blue to gray, and nothing else happens. I did all of the usual trouble shooting steps before contacting customer service. The first agent said I had already done everything she knew to suggest, and she couldn't help me. The second agent said to sign in on the website, change my password and try again, which made no sense. Tried it anyway. Shockingly, it didn't work.

Love Lowes. But this app sucks. It isn't reliable or helpful for ordering online or in person. When I need something for a job, I need to be able to look it up quickly and reliably. This app neither accurately tells me it is in stock at a store nor does it allow me to order online. I think the issue is with their address verification in the app. I have to go to a computer and order it. I often find what I want on this app and purchase it from Home Depot or Amazon. Negative Stars.

This app was useful for dinding items in stores but has turned to junk for some time now. Whenever intry to/add a receipt to my account, there is always an issue. Either it just spins when looking up the receipt, or it actually finds something and repeatedly asks for my phone number. At the end kf the day, it doesnt do what it should. Much easier to remeber to use my phone number at the register than habe to use this app after the fact.

The biggest problem is that the credit card and account information is not attached to your pro account beyond purchases. They have the most ridiculous billing methods; If you want to pay your card, add funds to your account for bigger purchases, or even check your account, be ready for headaches. The logins NEVER work, so, accessing it often takes a good hour or so on hold. If you add funds in store, those funds don't pay your credit card balance they are added on the other end. HATE IT!

Search function is useless. The search tries to preload results as you type but it starts to freeze and prevents you from typing anything else and just perpetually loads the same results over and over making it useless. I uninstalled the app, cleared cache data and restarted my phone and reinstalled it, but no luck. The search is still broken. I'll consider giving it a better review when the issue is resolved.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: I'm glad they brought back the ability to use the Lowe's credit card with the app. Since the update, I use the app once, noticed it didn't have all my purchase history, signed out, then it no longer acknowledge my password. Just says something went wrong. I change the password, which was accepted. I get the same message. These updates can suck sometimes.

It's a good app, I enjoy seeing approximated stock levels and item locations. The home page of the app is quite packed with all the deals and promotions, and it takes a second to find the actual place to search by department. I would give 5 stars, but the app usually freezes if you open it back up after being in the background for a long period of time. Force closing the app usually fixes the issue. I also don't like the portrait-only mode on the app for my tablet.

Terrible for tablet use. Switches between portrait and landscape on its own! Searching is annoying. Setting search parameters (price range, brand choices) does not work or is not clear how it is done (enabled). It was working (as in WAS somewhat usable) before. Now it is nothing but frustrating. Back to browser. Junk programming! Didn't do enough testing of code before release.

Pretty straightforward shopping experience. Your typical glitches are to be expected, I expect they'll improve this app over time and work out the bugs. In my case, I was told I had an incorrect password, and couldn't click ‘continue’ when entering my email to reset it, but after backing out and retrying the same password (it's automatically entered, so I know it's identical to the first attempt) the app allowed me to enter. I was able ultimately to purchase what I wanted, so 4/5 to Lowe's app.

Love the App. They've made improvements since 2021. Formerly it wouldn't keep accurate track of my purchases, now it does. The price check and product comparison is great. It seems that they may have improved their inventory control. In the past I never believed the on hand count. Now it is wrong only ½ the time, or less. I think they could make the list selection a bit more intuitive.

Lowe's is a large company with a huge footprint. They have an opportunity to dominate the home improvement DIY space with their mobile app and website, but in 2023 basic functionality such as search or trying to find the thing you're looking at (on a page) in a slightly different size are a nightmare on the mobile app. Want to copy some text to search for an item to search in Google or the other box website instead? Too bad. The Android app makes me sad every time I open it.

I left a 2 star review, and a couple weeks later, they released an update that improved it a lot. It's not perfect, but they're on the right track. Switching between images of an item is still horrible. It switches to whatever it wants 50% of the time. Select the 5th image and it will force you to the 2nd image a couple times before going to the image you want.

I like this app but it does weird stuff all the time. I'll clearly be logged in & it will tell me to log in. It also doesn't follow through with what you ask it to do sometimes & gives error messages frequently. The classic, "Uh-Oh, something went wrong". Today I was trying to add something to my cart for a purchase & although it said that the item was added, I'd go to the car & there'd be nothing there. It also kept locking me out of my account saying that I had the wrong password but I didn't.

Was ordering a sink which had two optional shipping dates. one was listed as free the other, was not free. opted for the later date due to the free shipping. As a veteran, I get a 10% discount. At checkout I noticed a shipping charge was applied. Called customer service to address the problem. They said since I received a 10% military discount, I was not authorized free shipping. They called it a double discount. Thanks lowes for supporting your veterans.

This app sucks!! Keeps losing settings like Protection Plan, accessories, etc. added every time I go to a subscreen to add more items.... Keeps displaying Apt # twice ("Unit E, Unit E"), refreshes and disappears, then reappears twice again... Kept resetting my Billing and Shipping Address.... And at the end, after purchase, **it showed the last 4 digits of someone else's credit card!!** (a Discover card, which I don't even own!) as the payment method. Holy crapoli, BUGGY+ANNOYING AF checkout!!

This was my first online order. I did not enjoy the process. It was frustrating to meticulously change; shipping to home, ship to store, pick up, or in store pickup, for every item. I got a message about not shipping to P.O. boxes even though I don't have a P.O. box address on record. If the items had been available in store I would much preferred to shop in person. It was a money and time saver in terms of gas and travel.

I work in the computer field so I'm okay with the app. But see it being difficult for someone not as advanced as I am. It's also slow and can be hard to navigate. I have also had issues signing up for some things on the app. such as my military discount and it has taken a long time in getting where I could do anything to add it on my account. I'm just waiting on my docs to add in order to get it now.

Love the app and the ability to order from it. Can make for quick trip if done rigth, for supplies or the like. My only complaint is that the pickup/delivery options have been a slight issue in that if you don't pay attention to every individual item, some may ship to home while others are in store.

Completely unusable after the latest update. Search windows tries to update the result after every keystroke which is fine if properly implemented, but the app puts up the spinning wheel after each letter and can't find any results. It finally times out saying no internet which is absolutely incorrect. Edit: per response from the developer it's been corrected. Checked and it's working for me again. Thanks!
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: The app functions well, but I think it is borderline manipulative with shipping. You should be able to use the search feature and filter based on free shipping. Some items are $79 for shipping, and you won't know until the checkout page. You can return the item due to error but can't get the shipping back. Wish they could respect the customer and either remove $80 on shipping for a $5 product or work on transparency with the pricing. It is deceptive.

Why does everybody create a great app and then ruin it with "improvements" and updates? Your MyLowe's barcode was once inside the diamond located in the upper left corner of the home screen. A very obvious placement, actually staring you in the face. Then they had to bury it behind multiple menu options that you pretty much need to memorize in order to find. This creates a very frustrating experience when trying to quickly check out. IF IT ISN'T BROKEN, DON'T FIX IT!!

I hate this app. The errors it gives are misleading in the app, but not when on a computer. Discounts are applied randomly & inconsistently and your total will change. Shipping is offered on items that aren't actually able to be shipped (the common reason for the error about an item removed from another browser). Reviews are useless because they're all from a paid promotion and inflated. And then there are the small, papercut annoyances all over that make the app an undesirable chore to use.

One of the worst apps I've ever installed. First try, I got it open but as soon as a try to search it freezes. Uninstalled/reinstalled and now I can't get past the store selection page - nothing responds. This is on a pixel 7 pro running android 14. Home Depot app works great and it's a significant factor in why I shop there more often.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you’re experiencing this issue. Please email us at apphelp@lowes.com to let us know a little more about what happened so we can help make it right. Thanks for shopping with Lowe’s.

data.text: Currently broken. When I type a character or two in the search field, it gets completely bogged down, constantly restarting the 'wait' spinner, and the next character I enter doesn't even appear. This app isn't really of any use if I can't search for what I need.

Got on the phone with customer support, she told me after the recent update lowe's credit card users can't use the app to log in. You HAVE to go onto the desktop version of Lowes. They say they don't control the app so they can't fix it... Pretty useless app if you can't view your credit card account through it.

This is one of the worst apps I've ever used. Search function rarely works without closing app and restarting it. I finally had to uninstall and re-download the app now I'm stuck in an endless loop because it won't let me enter my location to find my store. Lowe's you need a complete app redesign. This is garbage.

Product search no longer functions. Using GBoard keyboard. After entry of the first character in the search box, progress bar spins, and that's all she wrote. Won't accept any more input from the keyboard. Previous version (24.1.5) is OK.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which is now available in the Play Store. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: The app said no account found when I put my email and password in. So I created a new account using the same email and password I know I used before. I finally get signed in and my cart shows 7 items in it! When I checked the cart, it showed items I had put in there a couple of weeks ago. What an annoyance.

Worse app I have. Cannot search for an item without the app freezing up everytime, and I do mean everytime. Removed and reinstalled numerous times but the problem never goes away. Without a working search option what good is the app. If I could give a zero rating I would.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Received reply from lowes that app is working, We'll it is NOT FIXED Still typing a single charater in search it tries to search for results instead of whole word, causing search time too long and freeze of paa to go back or edit search .. Its going by typed characters the moment you type, I stead of hitting search or allowing time.to type in full word /words. Still issues in new app. *** Latest update is so annoying . Any search word that is typed, app tried it's time to immediately tries to
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: Used to work okayish, now it's hot trash. You literally cannot search unless you type one character every 10-20 seconds because it immediately tries to poll their inventory for results and causes your typed text to be deleted. Super useless and very annoying as a pretty loyal Lowe's customer and Lowe's Advantage cardholder who has to pay the card through their app / website.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: Normally ok, search does not work now. Update: cannot use search with Microsoft SwiftKey keyboard. Now constantly get error "Oops cannot find internet connection" after using another keyboard APP. UPDATE: latest version seems to have fixed both issues, thanks
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: App normally works fine however some moron in IT at lowes finds it fun to change the look of the app icon which makes finding it a pain since one week its blie, next green for 3 months oh but its Christmas so lets do black n gold? Lowes = blue...that other store...orange...guess which store doesnt change their iconic orange app icon....guess which app is my go to since I dont have to hunt for it...

Lowes has nice rewards compared to Home Depot. The only thing about the reward program is the fact that you don't get your rewards until you pick the item up even after you pay online. it would make it much better to get your rewards instantly to order more items with. online is easier than having to deal with rude women in store. it's a shame that the in- store experience is completely horrible compared to Ace Hardware or Home Depot. Lowes needs to do better in- store.
Something is really messed up with the search. It seems like something is trying to refresh or load, and that prevents the keyboard from entering characters until it's done. It's basically unusable.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which is now available in the Play Store. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Most recent update makes app unusable. Constantly telling me turn off airplane mode. When it does work you can't search for anything as it doesn't allow you to finish typing. Keeps trying to search after every letter you type in.

ordered online, got a message the ordered was ready. Arrived at the store and they canceled items, because they couldn't find them. I had to go and find the items on the top storage. I asked to speak to a manager several times and was told the manager is "too busy to talk with me." Still waiting...to get a lift to receive my items. I am so over Lowes.

After update you can't search. As soon as you start, it begins searching and totally locks up. USELESS now. Old app worked fine. Can't shop, can't order. Just CAN'T. And it has NOT been successfully addressed as Lowe's indicated 2 days ago.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: They broke the app. The departments list is more than halfway down the page, then you have to go to another screen just to select a department, IF it decides to actually load anything. It's faster to drive to the closest Lowes than to use this app atm
The search function has some bad bugs since the last update. It says no itenernet if you're connected to wifi and if you're not using the default keyboard it doesn't reliably register keystrokes.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: I placed a pickup order, which ended up requiring me to make three trips. Thought I could avoid another trip by having a $9 item delivered, but delivery would have been $79. I noticed they stocked the higher priced items.

Search is really slogging. Can't type letters some times. Can't highlight text in search. I didn't think it was updated today, but there was a new splash screen. I use this a few times a week and this is a new problem.

App was good until the new update. When you are in the search engine, as soon as you type one letter it automatically starts searching and then it won't let you type anymore. Great app but that needs to be fixed to keep it that way
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: Use to work fine until this latest version. Now I enter one character into the search field and when I try to enter a second character it just keeps spinning like it's trying to load and never let me hear anything else.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: There is a serious problem with the lowes app. You can only type two to three letters before search begins to freeze. Search will spin and skip the letters typed. We cannot view or select from search.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: Used to love this app. Not sure what happened, but it has become unusable. The app won't detect wifi, so I have to browse using data, then the search bar glitches while trying to search.
This app is nearly unusable. You can't type to search. It always prompts you to relogin with no ability to save or use fingerprint login. It's gotten so bad and used to just work. What happened??
data.replyText: We’re sorry you’re experiencing this issue. Please email us at apphelp@lowes.com to let us know what happened so we can help make it right. Thanks for shopping with Lowe’s.

data.text: One thing that stands out most for me, often times, items not where they're suppose to be, despite app stating they're in stock and general location. Employees have said items have either been stolen or moved to an endcap "somewhere else in the store" and no one tells them where... Can be frustrating at times.

The search feature has not been resolved as others have mentioned previously. I have uninstalled/reinstalled app and I am still unable to search for products. The feature is still not working even after it has claimed to be "resolved" on 3/12/24.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Search screen not functioning.. Since the last update, it has not worked... When I type it erase part of the word or the search screen just freezes.. Please fix.. I use the app alot.. I will change once it is fixed..
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Contextual search does not work. Type in one letter and the app locks up. They claim to have fixed it but there's no update available, removed and reinstalled, still locks up.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: This app is absolutely garbage. When attempting to search for anything, and I mean every single thing I search for such as simply typing soap or cleaner, it says there is nothing that they sell for that search. Impossible to find anything that isn't a click able ad.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: Considering the size of the Lowe's corporation, Lowe's website is completely inadequate, often inaccurate, the search engine is random at best, and I cannot even count the number of times that I have reported errors to them online which never get corrected. it is an inexcusable effort from start to finish.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Horrible. Only works 25% of the time. Mostly just spins. You have to do a force stop to get it to work most times. I sometimes buy from other stores simply because I can't search for the item on this app.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: Search bar malfunctions frequently Edit: search bar was fixed 3/13 Butmnow when I try to tap on a link from a Lowes email and it opens the app for the link, the app just shows the spinning circle indefinitely instead of taking me to the thing I tapped on
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which is now available in the Play Store. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Same problem as others, I can longer type inside the search bar. I just uninstalled and reinstalled the app, then it said my log in information was invalid. So I went to the web page to try it and it logged in fine. So why won't the app accept my credentials??
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which is now available in the Play Store. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: The search function is unusable. It freezes and constantly says you're offline. It barely lets you type as it will freeze for a few seconds after every letter you enter.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: When switching btwn apps, going from lowes to a spreadsheet, and back to lowes app, the app gets stuck. Thinking for a long time, and I have to close and reopen the app. It's annoying, but not the end of the world! And yes it's updated.

App is very slow, crashes a lot, tends to be inaccurate and incomplete as far as inventory and item availability, sometimes their items in store that aren't shown in the app, locations of items is inconsistent at best. Really need to do a better job

Much better than dealing with the person working in-store today who blocked my shopping area with a giant machine; and better than the other clerk who told me that the clearance item I wanted (for 32.99) would cost $80.00 to ship. Ordering it online is actually free. Store clerk told me that there are 4 more on order, and that I could check with another store, which MIGHT have that clearance item. Since I don't drive, that's not much of an option. Great customer service...SMH.

This app is absolute garbage. Order tracking is inaccurate (says picked up when I just placed it in store yesterday and it won't be ready for two weeks). The two factor authentication was coded by imbeciles who have only a vague idea what it is. It can send you in a back-and-forth loop with codes while never really authenticating you. The login process is janky at best and is prone to forgetting who I am within minutes of logging in. You might get some useful product information but that's it.

I didn't recieve my military discount during checkout this continues to happen. I'm very angry at this. I have to go to customer service to have them refund my discount back to my card. Please tell me why you can't seem to fix this even after repeated complaints from me. I end up going to home depot who clearly give me my military discount every time I purchase online.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you’re experiencing this issue. Please email us at apphelp@lowes.com to let us know a little more about what is happening with your account so we can help make it right. Thanks for shopping with Lowe’s.

data.text: Don't ever make an online order. I was waiting 2 months to get my refund. The actually waiting for the seller (third party company) will approve the cancellation. I had to call the seller and begged them to cancel the order! Unbelievable. Worst service ever. Don't say I didn't warn you!!

I have an ordering for the past year and a 1/2. And I constantly received damage or not. Working products from lowe's very disappointing, but i've also had the same experience at home depot. I would also like to point out that they have a ridiculous turn around time. With shipping product to their stores.

The last two updates are broken. First, search didn't work. Now nothing wants to load. Just spins. The desktop website gives the message "not authorized on this server" on windows Chrome, Microsoft and Android Chrome.

It is very convenient until I get in store and I lose strong signal. Also it makes me log in seemingly every time I go to the store and want to show the myLowes barcode for my account or lookup products while shopping and talking with associates. When shopping and using away from the store it is great and very helpful!

App was solid before, but the entire account management & wallet functions have been cleaned up a fair bit lately. Managing payment methods and shopping are smooth as can be, and order tracking is easy. Great app for a hardware store! My only complaint is that I don't like having to enter the search function to browse by category.
New update is horrible! There is something wrong with the search function interrupting the text entry via on screen keyboard. Lag lag lag is causing this to be unusable!

The most annoying thing about this app is it's inability to recover any type of data connection after it goes idle for a while. I have to kill the app and start it over so it can fetch data whether it's WiFi or cellular. I checked my settings and I actually allow the app to run in the background but what good is it doing?
data.replyText: We’re sorry you’re experiencing this issue. Please update to the latest release (23.4.3) or contact us at apphelp@lowes.com if the problem persists. Thanks for shopping with Lowe’s.

data.text: it's embarrassing how bad and buggy this app is. This is absolutely unusable. Lowe's could replace this with a pdf file of their entire catalog, and it would be a massive improvement.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you’re experiencing this issue. Please email us at apphelp@lowes.com to let us know a little more about what happened so we can help make it right. Thanks for shopping with Lowe’s.

data.text: Having the same problem as mentioned previously with not being able to search. It just constantly refreshes. I actually was at Lowes today and was very frustrated. I gave up and just used the website to find things.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We addressed it in our latest version (v24.3.2) which should be available soon. Let us know if you experience any issues at apphelp@lowes.com.

data.text: Non functional. Won't let me type - have to press same letter multiple times to register. Also, once I get the search word in, it won't search. It says I offline. Uninstalling and sticking with Home Depot.
data.replyText: We’re sorry you had this issue earlier. We addressed the issue today, and search should be working now. Let us know if you keep experiencing issues with search at apphelp@lowes.com, and thanks!

data.text: I like this app, but initial checkout was obnoxious. Checkout was blocked without an address. This involved entering my address and phone number three times for a PICKUP order. The billing address needs an option to use the address on file. Confirmation screen still showed an old phone number 😵 Went to account info to update. Required text code. Twice. So, I provided my phone number 5 times and address 3 times for one order. Otherwise, it's a decent app that I find useful when it works right.

Works perfectly! There are no issues so far. In app financing or kust normal shopping all made easy with the Lowes App. I did not have it for years and was not really able to take full advantage of what they had to offer. Great app, great store, friendly staff and apple/google pay as well. Not sure if all locations upgraded or just this one.

App kept giving me error at check out when I tried to paying saying an item has been added to my cart using another browser ... nothing was so I had to keep removing, adding items again and click store pick and after doing the order over mult times it finally accepted me pressing check out button to finalize payment..

Aggravating and annoying. It was easy originally, but the app seems to be buggy at best. First they don't tell you that something isn't in stock, you find out when you get there it isn't in your bag. I've waited almost a week for 3 gfi outlets. The package said ready but it was not I have to go back for 3 outlets that were sponsored on the app. They don't tell you the part isn't in the store.

Ah, The Spinning Circle of Death. That's all I ever seem to get anymore on this app when I enter a search query. Extremely unreliable. I have the Samsung S23+ which basically was their flagship phone until 2 weeks ago with all the possible updates, yet this app has been a problem for at least 3-4 months. Beyond frustrating and I can tell Lowe's with certainty it has cost them a few of my sales because I haven't been able to look something up for availability vs The Orange Place.

Absolute trash. Glitches, crashes constantly, can't add receipts and when your report it to CS they do nothing to help but ask you to supply a ton of info multiple times and still can't get your receipts/points added. Hate that it defaults all access to app when trying to access website. TRASH 🗑
